attributes.comment:
I question the validity of the increase in fees given the services provided for the
current fee. Processing time is extended and documents are valid for too short a
period. The current fees are sufficient for services provided. Increasing the fees
will increase the financial burden on potential adoptive families. This proposed
increase along with the expected increases anticipated from implementation of
Hague requirements and the increase in processing time for all adoptions will
result in families not being able to adopt because of financial reasons. Unless the
goal is for international adoption to be limited to the wealthy any and all fee
increases should be implemented only if validity periods for the documents are
extended. The proposed fee increases along with the re-application fees
necessitated by extnended time for processing will result in a windfall to the
agency.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Delia Owens
